longBusinessSummary: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited provides various financial products and services. It operates in four segments: Corporate, SME, Retail, and Insurance. The company offers deposit products, such as savings, current, fixed deposit, long term deposit, foreign currency, and E passbook deposit accounts; home, car, personal, and mortgage loans; debit and credit cards; investment products comprising mutual funds, debentures, bonds, and treasury bills; accident, savings, health expense, cancer, heritage and life protection, income protection, travel, motor, loan protection, property, unit linked, and other insurance products; and various payment services. It also provides credit facilities, such as overdrafts, promissory note, clean bill discount, long term loans, letter of guarantee, standby letter of credit, and acceptance/Aval; financial advisory and merger acquisition services; fixed income instrument and underwriting service; structured and project finance; foreign exchange and interest rate risk management services; and investment solutions. In addition, the company offers business collection, business payments, and bank accounts and liquidity management solutions; corporate trust services, including custody, mutual fund supervisor, registrar, escrow agent, security agent, and debenture holder's representative services; international trade remittance, fund transfer, and foreign exchange services; and digital banking services. It operates through its head office and branch network in Thailand; and through its branches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Laos, Vietnam, Shanghai, the Cayman Islands, and Myanmar, as well as through its subsidiary in Cambodia. The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
longName: The Siam Commercial Bank Public Company Limited
